name: Dotfiles (Debian test)
postCreateCommand: /bin/bash -lc 'apt-get update -y && apt-get install -y git curl ca-certificates && chmod +x ./.dotfiles/bin/*.sh || true && ./.dotfiles/bin/validate.sh || true && ./.dotfiles/bin/bootstrap.sh --dry-run || true && ./.dotfiles/bin/setup-xforward.sh --dry-run || true'
